title: Elfa Skills
description: Integration with Elfa AI API providing data analysis and processing capabilities with secure authentication for advanced data operations

get_mentions.title: Get Mentions
get_mentions.description: This tool uses the Elfa AI API to query hourly-updated tweets from "smart accounts" – accounts identified as influential or relevant – that have received at least 10 interactions (comments, retweets, quote tweets).

get_top_mentions.title: Get Top Mentions
get_top_mentions.description: This tool uses the Elfa API to query tweets mentioning a specific stock ticker. The tweets are ranked by view count, providing insight into the most visible and potentially influential discussions surrounding the stock. The results are updated hourly, allowing for real-time monitoring of market sentiment.

search_mentions.title: Search Mentions
search_mentions.description: This tool uses the Elfa API to search tweets mentioning up to five keywords. It can search within the past 30 days of data, which is updated every 5 minutes, or access up to six months of historical tweet data.

get_trending_tokens.title: Get Trending Tokens
get_trending_tokens.description: This tool ranks the most discussed tokens based on smart mentions count for a given period, with updates every 5 minutes via the Elfa API. Smart mentions provide a more sophisticated measure of discussion volume than simple keyword counts.

get_smart_stats.title: Get Smart Stats
get_smart_stats.description: This tool uses the Elfa API to retrieve key social media metrics for a given username. These metrics include Smart Following Count, Engagement Score, and Engagement Ratio.

states.description: States for each Elfa skill (disabled, public, or private)
